attributes.title: 2019 Ford Ranger 3.2 TDCi XLT Double-Cab

attributes.description:
Please visit www.cbkmotors.co.za for a virtual tour of this car as well as our online showroom. You can also click the Finance Option to do a remote finance application and get pre-approved on the vehicle of your choice. This is a fantastic hot hatch and is a pleasure to drive. She is very clean and mechanically sound with a full service history and features that include; Recaro Sport Seats, Satellite Controls on the Steering, Blue tooth for calls,cruise control,traction control,voice command, Rear PDC and much more! We take things a little more seriously at CBK Motors we do a full ABC Assessment on all vehicles. A: Body for dents, scratches and scuff marks. B: Overall Mechanical check over and C: Cosmetic and interior assessment for your buying pleasure! E&O
COME AND VIEW!
Finance Can be Arranged! 
Trade-ins Accepted!
Please contact our friendly and professional sales team for assistance!
Office: 010 449 3410 
Patrick: 068 521 2876
David : 067 131 6474
Zander: 065 830 9133
(Should you require any AFTER HOURS assistance please call our landline, follow the voice prompt and Press 1 for sales and we will gladly assist you!)
